name: Are we alone? (GremlinT)
description:
Game about looking for friends in deep space.

3 parts: 

- scner for looking life

- space travel

- planet travel

Move - arrows

In space move - up arrow, mouse for rotation. In space gravity is working,  be careful.

For exit at any time - press ESC

p.s. Look like scaner is selfmade, and when you find something, scaner say you a nomber of planet incorrect, add "1" to nomber instead of plus it (for exmple, is life is on second planer, scaner say that life is on 11 planet)
